content: learn how to make a super cute crochet teddy bear purse with this free pattern for this pattern you will need 4 25mm hook worsted weight yarn in colors of your choice zipper small amount of stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch markers fabric for lining and matching thread optional sewing needle optional abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together chain- chain
